animals.name: Polar Bear
animals.fun_fact: Their skin is black under their white fur.

animals.name: Alligator
animals.description: A large reptile with powerful jaws and armored skin.
animals.fun_fact: They can live up to 50 years in the wild.

animals.name: Great White Shark
animals.description: One of the most powerful predators in the ocean.
animals.fun_fact: They can detect a drop of blood from miles away.

animals.name: Zebra
animals.description: African equine known for its black-and-white stripes.
animals.fun_fact: Every zebra has a unique stripe pattern.

animals.name: Golden Retriever
animals.description: Friendly, intelligent, and devoted family dog.
animals.fun_fact: They were originally bred for retrieving game from water.

animals.name: Python
animals.fun_fact: They can swallow prey larger than their head.

animals.name: Blue Whale
animals.description: The largest animal to have ever lived on Earth.
animals.fun_fact: Their heart can weigh as much as a car.

animals.name: Monkey
animals.description: Highly intelligent primates known for their agility.
animals.fun_fact: Some monkeys use tools like sticks to get food.

animals.name: Bumblebee
animals.description: Fuzzy, buzzing pollinators known for their stinging defense.
animals.fun_fact: They can fly despite their seemingly awkward body size.

animals.name: Tiger
animals.description: A solitary big cat known for its power and stripes.
animals.fun_fact: No two tigers have the same stripes.
